name: Karthik B

projects: AI-Powered Navigation and Text to Speech Assistive Device February 2025 – Present For The Visually Impaired This project introduces an AI-powered assistive device designed to improve mobility and independence for visually impaired individuals. Unlike traditional aids such as canes and guide dogs, it offers real-time object recognition and contextual awareness. The device is lightweight, portable, and functions without the need for cloud-based processing, ensuring ease of use and reliability. Deployed the app on Vercel with environment- based config management.
